remarks: Change the index set to a subset in an upper integer sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
statement:
sumss.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
sumss.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
sumss.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = 0 ) $.
sumss.4 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
sumss $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A C = sum_ k e. B C ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d M k $.
$d k ph $.
